Comment: As my great grandmother once said, ‚ÄúNow is not the time to panic, there‚Äôs plenty of time for that later.‚Äù I think we‚Äôve done a great job of staying calm, and planning for the future. We‚Äôve already achieved several victories since our loss in the 2024 presidential election. With Trump and his incompetent administration, we should be able to do well in the governor elections this year, as well as the midterms that are coming up.  Musk may be able to funnel millions into these elections, but as Wisconsin voters proved, we can get past his corruption and elect people who truly represent our best interests.  If I was going to give an optimistic, but realistic answer, I fully believe that democrats will win a very comfy majority in the house, and a slim majority in the senate, however it‚Äôs not entirely unrealistic that democrats could pick up more seats as well.  In the end, we have a very strong reason to get out and vote, while republican voters might not have that same energy as they did when they were voting for Trump. I fully believe that as long as we carry this same energy to 2026, and potentially 2028, we can get our glorious nation back on the path to prosperity.
